author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Can you add compatibility information and retrigger?

Hi,

where should i add it?

On Sat, May 25, 2019 at 5:02 PM Fredrik Ekre <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Can you add compatibility information and retrigger?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/944?email_source=notifications&email_token=ALM2JPCE643PCZXZSSDX6RDPXFIHPA5CNFSM4HO7OHZKYY3PNVWWK3TUL52HS4DFVREXG43VMVBW63LNMVXHJKTDN5WW2ZLOORPWSZGODWHTNPY#issuecomment-495924927>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ALM2JPCDGI3FGLDVL72EOADPXFIHPANCNFSM4HO7OHZA>
> .
>


-- 
Marco Congedo

Sorry, to the `Project.toml` file. Something like
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
should suffice in your case since you don't really have any other dependencies. See https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/compatibility/ for more details.

OK, thanks, i will.

Marco
